{{Infobox Berry |name = #07 Oran |image = [[File:Oran.png]] |caption = Nature's gifts came together as one in this Berry. It has a wondrous mix of flavors that spread in the mouth. |growtime = 5m |harvest = 8 berries |replant = 50% |points = 20 |flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} '''Oran''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pok√©mon on routes. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-120s || 120-180s || 180-240s || 240-300s || 300-600s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:OranTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:OranTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:OranTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
